articles.description: Contract awarded by Dutch pension fund Pensioenfonds PGB is one of the biggest ESG mandates
articles.content: London-based boutique asset manager Osmosis has won a contract to run a $4.5bn sustainable investment strategy on behalf of a Dutch state pension fund in one of the largest allocations of its type ev… [+3836 chars]
